i was first introduced to this franchise at the age of 7 currently 23 the 2encond coming gave me a great eye opener as to how 3rd person platforming shooters should be made and played im beyond thankful that such a kickass company such as nightdive is taking the risk to revamp these cult classic titles with a modern day face lift and yet never fall short of a master piece would be awesome to see 2 comeback to life alongside darque legacy to give this series a new lease on life

this is the original game expanded upon and built upon this is everything the original tried to be yet was unable to be due to time constraints and limitations of 90s tech its what every remastered game should aim to be the absolute best job any developer couldve done for such an iconic game job well done nightdive studios

really good game assuming youre playing on normal on the horror the combat is so overtuned that it ruins the entire game
pretty flippin good if you ask me and it makes me feel sick

if you love backtracking having absolutely no idea where to go at all times and surroundings which all look the same then this is the game for you   note that my review is about the actual game not the port the latter has been done magnificently by night dive

never played this game before in its day it ran perfectly and buttery smooth it has a semiopen world to navigate with a one of a kind setting it gives you enough hints on the travel screen on what you should be doing and what is obtainable it will give you a challenge that i found to be fair even on the highest difficulty  a polished old gem worthy of a buy

the greatest game i ever played on ps1 the challenge the atmosphere the utter joy at finding another dark soul  kudos to the  nightdive team the lighting and shadows in this are beautiful the sound is always tense and keeps me on edge you have kept all the original ps1 charm and game difficulty whilst bringing the game firmly and beautifully into 2024easily the best purchase ive made on steam  i pray there will be a remaster of shadowman 2 the 2nd coming
what a masterpiece of a game i havent had that much fun playing a videogame in a long time do yourself a favor and definitely play this gem
amazing
fantastic remake of a fantastic game think of it like a voodoo tomb raider in hell

i absolutely loved this game when i played it on n64 now its remastered on pc and even better  and now with the updates the game is better yet again  such a classic game with a mixture of platforming action horror rpg elements and skill mastery  a fantastic 4060 hour playthrough
loved playing threw this remaster the double side jump is op as always as soon as you have 100 trade them in

when i was in school my friend gave me ps1 for few weeks i played 2 games silent hill and shadow man i have finished the 1st but never this one  omg this is such a nostalgy and fun to play i did not enjoy a game like this for long time i cannot explain why plkaying it gave me goosbumps  big industrial labirinths of deadside with lurking creatures  behind the corner fun fun fun

one of the best 3d metroidvanias ever made the lack of a map is a bit unfortunate but the great fast travel system and objective list more than make up for it movement is a bit like the og tomb raider games but somewhat simplified the combat is is better then the og tomb raider games

this was by far one of the best games on the nintendo 64 back in the day and nightdives remaster just makes it that much better  absolutely worth the money for metroidvania and retro3d fans  highly recommended
easily replayable i love getting lost in deadside 1010
if you liked the first this is a must no doubt

excellent remaster for an excellent game with a lot of qol features tons of graphical improvements without changing the art style and extended levels with restored cut content honestly this is the best remaster of a classic game ive ever played to this date
excellent atmosphere subpar in every other area

coming from the n64 version of the game this is a huge step up better graphics improved audio and new areas to explore all enhance the atmosphere of the game immensely and this was already a game that had a lot of atmosphere i cannot rate this game highly enough if you loved playing shadowman when it first came out get this game

this game is a gem 3d metroidvania mixed with collectathon platformer on a horror setting also you get to the protagonist talking about dark souls constantly which is hilarious pretty much perfect remaster as well
a deliciously remastered dark adventure of a classic game what a blast to play
what a great foreboding experience
fantastic

this is one of the best games on steam bc it is a perfect reflection on actual reality art turly imitates life here in that in this game your protagonist shadowman must travel and master between both relms of deadside video gaming and liveside real life as in reality our time is split between gaming and real life in shadowman he must manage his time between deadside and liveside and become the god of his own reality  top tier would play again

never played this game before in its day it ran perfectly and buttery smooth it has a semiopen world to navigate with a one of a kind setting it gives you enough hints on the travel screen on what you should be doing and what is obtainable it will give you a challenge that i found to be fair even on the highest difficulty  a polished old gem worthy of a buy

the greatest game i ever played on ps1 the challenge the atmosphere the utter joy at finding another dark soul  kudos to the  nightdive team the lighting and shadows in this are beautiful the sound is always tense and keeps me on edge you have kept all the original ps1 charm and game difficulty whilst bringing the game firmly and beautifully into 2024easily the best purchase ive made on steam  i pray there will be a remaster of shadowman 2 the 2nd coming
what a masterpiece of a game i havent had that much fun playing a videogame in a long time do yourself a favor and definitely play this gem
